column1: (U) ,"USIC","(U) ","Document claims compliance with all rules encoded in ISM for

column5: documents produced by the US Intelligence Community. Documents that claim compliance
with USIC MUST also claim compliance with USGov."

column1: (U) ,"USDOD","(U) ","Document claims compliance with all rules encoded in ISM for

column5: documents produced by the US Department of Defense. Documents that claim compliance
